title: Why does League show Incorrect Level
body: Im currently Level 30 but my summoner info on boards says Im level 4.

replies.body:
Sometimes it's been a while since your Boards and Summoner profiles have synced up. Posting on the boards will generally force a resync and will resolve the issue fairly quickly. This seems to be what happened, as you now show as level 30. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
